A fork of CertPatrol implements ''pinning'' for Firefox. Certificate pins are also checked using DANE protocol.

What's New in Version 0.2.3

Added ability to override "this certificate is untrusted" with TLSA record that has certificate usage 2 or 3. This is by default turned off (see preferences). The override of untrusted certificates is enabled by default. Library ldns bumped to latest version 1.6.15.

Credits.

DANE Patrol authors:
CZ.NIC Labs

Certificate Patrol authors:
Prototyped by 20after4 (Mukunda Modell), first reengineered by Aiko Barz, again (since 2.0) by Gabor Adam Toth. Originally conceived, planned and continously refined by the lynX (Carlo v. Loesch).
